oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pap Singleton Songster
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hickman, Hester
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Towns, Neighborhoods
Songsters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pamphlet sold by Benjamin Singleton with lyrics advertising the emigration to Kansas. The lyrics were written by Mrs. Hester Hickman of Nashville.

This "songster" or pamphlet of song lyrics, was sold by Benjamin Singleton. The lyrics, written by Hester Hickman of Nashville, advertised the emigration to Kansas. The lyrics to "The Land That Gives Birth to Freedom" note the hard conditions in Tennessee for the formerly enslaved and affirm the desire of African Americans to enjoy a peaceful home life.
